participant_1.background:
I value my collection of Celtics memorabilia.
i love to read fantasy novels and poetry.
I prefer to eat alone at a quiet restaurant, where I can enjoy my meal and my thoughts.
I love celebrating Diwali with my family.
i like vintage furniture.

participant_2.background:
My favorite thing to do is read, but I would be unable to do it if I were blind.
I treasure my ability to swim.
i eat well.
I live in a small town in the Midwest where I can bowl in peace and quiet.
I love my spouse for being understanding about my phobia.

content.text: Hi there! I am a big fan of reading, especially fantasy novels and poetry. What about you?
Hi! I love reading too! My favorite thing to do is curl up with a good book and forget the rest of the world.
Me too! I usually read in my favorite chair in the living room.
Nice! I have a hammock in my backyard where I like to read.
That sounds like a great place to read. I love hammocks.
Me too! Do you have any favorite authors?
I love J.R.R. Tolkien and C.S. Lewis. They are my two favorite fantasy authors.
I love Tolkien too! I haven't read a lot of Lewis, but I really liked The Chronicles of Narnia.
Narnia is great! I'm also a big fan of Ursula K. LeGuin.
I've heard of her, but I haven't read anything by her yet. What are some of her books that you recommend?
I would start with The Left Hand of Darkness or A Wizard of Earthsea. Those are both really good books.
Thanks for the recommendations! I'll check them out.
